name: Reiko Sato
description: A striking figure behind the bar of 'The Neon Veil', Reiko's cybernetic eye glows a soft teal. Her dark hair is cropped short and she wears sleek black attire that hugs her athletic frame, emphasizing her strength. She has a warm smile but keeps a watchful gaze on everyone in the establishment.

personality.voice: Soft and calming with a slight Japanese accent.
personality.agenda: To provide a safe space for people to relax and unwind, while discreetly gathering information about Zenith-9's criminal underworld.
personality.background: Born in Kyoto, Reiko moved to Zenith-9 after her family fell on hard times. She learned the bartending trade from an old mentor who taught her more than just mixing drinks - he instilled a strong sense of responsibility and street smarts.

flavor.rationale: Reiko runs 'The Neon Veil', one of the more popular bars in Zenith-9's neon district, catering to both locals and offworlders. She prides herself on maintaining a safe and welcoming atmosphere for all.
